name: Abhishek Agarwalla
about: Building Fabric - an AI recruiter that makes hiring great technical talent 10x faster at 50% of the cost of staffing agencies

experience.title: Co-founder and CEO
experience.description: Fabric is building autonomous AI agents to transform technical recruiting from a slow, expensive bottleneck into a seamless, efficient process.We envision a world where finding the right technical talent takes days, not months - where AI agents conduct human-like interviews at scale, understanding not just technical skills but also potential and fit.Our mission is to help great companies and talented engineers find each other faster, removing the friction and inefficiencies that cost unnecessary time and money.We're starting with Rebecca, our AI technical recruiter that fully automates screening calls, and building towards a future where AI agents make scaling world-class engineering teams super easy.
experience.description_html: Fabric is building autonomous AI agents to transform technical recruiting from a slow, expensive bottleneck into a seamless, efficient process.We envision a world where finding the right technical talent takes days, not months - where AI agents conduct human-like interviews at scale, understanding not just technical skills but also potential and fit.Our mission is to help great companies and talented engineers find each other faster, removing the friction and inefficiencies that cost unnecessary time and money.We're starting with Rebecca, our AI technical recruiter that fully automates screening calls, and building towards a future where AI agents make scaling world-class engineering teams super easy.

experience.title: CEO & Co-Founder
experience.description: Aidetic is an AI Consulting firm working with enterprises to enable AI led digital transformation.We've worked with 35+ businesses to integrate AI into their processes and tools. We contribute to our clients' mission success through our expertise in developing state of the art NLP/CV powered data processing pipelines as well as designing efficient MLOps systems for performance at scale.

experience.title: Decision Analytics Associate
experience.description: â€¢ Worked on sales force structuring, product launch analytics, market segmentation, and customer targeting for multinational clients in the pharmaceutical industryâ€¢  Worked on generating business insights from structured data using advanced statistical methods and predictive modeling algorithms and communicating results in the form of interactive dashboards, summary reports and slide decks in a client-friendly mannerâ€¢ Gained expertise in machine learning techniques such as regression, SVMs, tree-based methods (random forests and boosting), clustering etc. by applying them to solve real-world sales and marketing problemsâ€¢ Developed proficiency in R, SAS, SQL, Excel, and other internal proprietary tools within a short timeframeâ€¢ Aided clients in making data-driven decisions for a wide variety of business problems by providing ad-hoc analytics support and gained client-facing exposure as a resultâ€¢ Fine-tuned communication and organization skills; inculcated teamwork values by working in a diverse team with members across countries

volunteer_experience.info: As an exchange participant to AIESEC Mauritius, I volunteered in several environmental campaigns apart from working as a blogger and photographer. I also actively participated in AIDS awareness campaigns. Fervently working towards coral reef conservation, curbing air & water pollution, and marine habitat restoration, I along with the team, spread awareness throughout the island so as to make an impact.
